00047 void RainbruRPG::Core::ChartLine::draw(){
00048   computeMargins();
00049   /* Declare the image */
00050   gdImagePtr im;
00051   /* Declare output files */
00052   FILE *pngout;
00053   /* Declare color indexes */
00054   int black;
00055   int white;
00056   int lightGray;
00057 
00058   im = gdImageCreateTrueColor(imageWidth, imageHeight);
00059 
00060   // Allocate the colors
00061   black = gdTrueColor(0, 0, 0);  
00062   white = gdTrueColor(255, 255, 255);  
00063   lightGray = gdTrueColor(220, 240, 220);  
00064 
00065   // white background
00066   gdImageFilledRectangle(im, 1, 1, imageWidth-2, imageHeight-2, white);
00067 
00068   computePreDrawing();
00069 
00070   // Drawing private functions 
00071   drawAxis(im, black);
00072   drawChartTitle(im, black);
00073   drawYAxisCaption(im, black);
00074   drawXAxisCaption(im, black);
00075   drawLegendBackground(im, black, lightGray);
00076   drawLeftCaption(im);
00077   drawBottomCaption(im);
00078 
00079   drawLegend(im);
00080 
00081   drawSeries(im);
00082 
00083   // Save file
00084   pngout = fopen(filename, "wb");
00085   gdImagePng(im, pngout);
00086   fclose(pngout);
00087 
00088   // Destroy the image in memory.
00089   gdImageDestroy(im);
00090 }

00097 void RainbruRPG::Core::ChartLine::drawSeries(gdImagePtr im){
00098   cout << "drawSeries called" << endl;
00099   cout << "chartSerieList.size=" << chartSerieList->size() << endl;
00100 
00101   int black=gdTrueColor(0, 0, 0);
00102 
00103 // Create constant iterator for list.
00104   tChartSerieList::const_iterator iter;
00105 
00106   int color=0;
00107   // Iterate through list and output each element.
00108   for (iter=chartSerieList->begin(); iter != chartSerieList->end(); iter++){
00109     if (color>seriesColor.size()){
00110       drawOneSerie(im, (*iter), black);
00111     }
00112     else{
00113       drawOneSerie(im, (*iter), seriesColor[color]);
00114     }
00115 
00116     color++;
00117   }
00118 }

00126 void RainbruRPG::Core::ChartLine::
00127 drawOneSerie(gdImagePtr im,ChartSerie* s, int c){
00128 
00129   int top=exteriorMargin;
00130   int right=imageWidth-exteriorMargin-legendWidth-legendExteriorMargin;
00131   int graphHeight=bottom-top;
00132 
00133   int y, y2; 
00134   double value;
00135   int x=left;
00136   int x2=left;
00137   double v=1;
00138 
00139   value=(s->getValue(0))-(s->getMinValue());
00140   y=bottom-((graphHeight*value)/serieInterval);
00141 
00142   // draw Loop
00143   for (int i=0; i<(s->size()); i++){
00144     v=s->getValue(i);
00145     value=v-(s->getMinValue());
00146     y2=bottom-((graphHeight*value)/serieInterval);
00147     gdImageLine(im, x, y, x2, y2, c);  
00148     y=y2;
00149     x=x2;
00150     x2+=xDev;
00151   }
00152 }
00153 
00157 void RainbruRPG::Core::ChartLine::computePreDrawing(){
00158 
00159   // Modify leftCaptionMargin and bottomCaptionMargin
00160   leftCaptionMargin+=getLeftCaptionMaxWidth()+10;
00161   bottomCaptionMargin+=getBottomCaptionMaxHeight()+20;
00162 
00163 
00164   // Get the serieInterval value
00165   bottom=imageHeight-exteriorMargin-titleMargin-bottomCaptionMargin;
00166   left=0+exteriorMargin+leftCaptionMargin;
00167 
00168   int top=exteriorMargin;
00169   int right=imageWidth-exteriorMargin-legendWidth-legendExteriorMargin;
00170   int graphHeight=bottom-top;
00171 
00172   // Get the biggest interval in all series
00173   serieInterval=getSeriesMaxValue()-getSeriesMinValue();
00174 
00175   // If serieInterval is 1, we set it to 2
00176   if(serieInterval==1){
00177     serieInterval=2;
00178   }
00179 
00180   // Get thze biggest serie
00181   ChartSerie* bigSerie=getBiggestSerie();
00182   xDev=(right-left)/(bigSerie->size()-1);
00183 
00184 }

00191 double RainbruRPG::Core::ChartLine::getSeriesMinValue(){
00192   double ret=0;
00193   double temp;
00194 
00195   tChartSerieList::const_iterator iter;
00196   for (iter=chartSerieList->begin(); iter != chartSerieList->end(); iter++){
00197     temp=(*iter)->getMinValue();
00198     if (temp<ret)
00199       ret=temp;
00200   }
00201   return ret;
00202 }
00203 
00209 double RainbruRPG::Core::ChartLine::getSeriesMaxValue(){
00210   double ret=0;
00211   double temp;
00212 
00213   tChartSerieList::const_iterator iter;
00214   for (iter=chartSerieList->begin(); iter != chartSerieList->end(); iter++){
00215     temp=(*iter)->getMaxValue();
00216     if (temp>ret)
00217       ret=temp;
00218   }
00219   return ret;
00220 }

00225 int RainbruRPG::Core::ChartLine::getLeftCaptionMaxWidth(){
00226   ostringstream oss;
00227   oss.precision(2);
00228   oss << getSeriesMaxValue();
00229   return getTextWidth(oss.str().c_str(), captionFontSize);
00230 }
00231 
00237 void RainbruRPG::Core::ChartLine::drawLeftCaption(gdImagePtr im){
00238   int indicWidth=3;
00239   int valueTextWidth;
00240 
00241   int black=gdTrueColor(0, 0, 0);
00242   int top=exteriorMargin;  
00243   int right=imageWidth-exteriorMargin-legendWidth-legendExteriorMargin;
00244   int graphHeight=bottom-top;
00245 
00246   std::stringstream valueText;
00247 
00248   for (int value=getSeriesMinValue(); value<getSeriesMaxValue()+1; value++){
00249     // Draws the indicators
00250     int y=bottom-((graphHeight*value)/serieInterval);
00251     gdImageLine(im, left-indicWidth, y, left, y, black); 
00252 
00253     // Draws the captions
00254     valueText << value;
00255     valueTextWidth=getTextWidth(valueText.str(), captionFontSize);
00256 
00257     drawTrueType (valueText.str(), left-indicWidth-valueTextWidth, 
00258                   y+(captionFontSize/2), im, black, captionFontSize);
00259 
00260     valueText.str("");
00261   }
00262 }

00269 RainbruRPG::Core::ChartSerie* RainbruRPG::Core::ChartLine::getBiggestSerie(){
00270   int curValue=0;
00271   ChartSerie* ret;
00272 
00273   tChartSerieList::const_iterator iter;
00274   for (iter=chartSerieList->begin(); iter != chartSerieList->end(); iter++){
00275     if ((*iter)->size() > curValue){
00276       ret=(*iter);
00277       curValue=(*iter)->size();
00278     }
00279   }
00280   return ret;
00281 }

00288 void RainbruRPG::Core::ChartLine::drawBottomCaption(gdImagePtr im){
00289   int indicWidth=3;
00290   int x2=left;
00291   int valueTextWidth;
00292 
00293   ChartSerie* bigOne=getBiggestSerie();
00294 
00295   int black=gdTrueColor(0, 0, 0);
00296 
00297   std::string valueText;
00298 
00299   for (int i=0; i<bigOne->size(); i++){
00300     // Draws the indicators
00301     gdImageLine(im, x2, bottom, x2, bottom+indicWidth, black); 
00302 
00303     // Draws the captions
00304     valueText=bigOne->getXCaption(i);
00305     valueTextWidth=getTextWidth(valueText, captionFontSize);
00306 
00307     drawTrueTypeUp (valueText, x2+(captionFontSize/2), 
00308                   bottom+valueTextWidth+5, im, black, captionFontSize);
00309 
00310     // Next step ^^
00311     x2+=xDev;
00312 
00313   }
00314 }

00321 int RainbruRPG::Core::ChartLine::getBottomCaptionMaxHeight(){
00322   int ret=0;
00323 
00324   int valueTextWidth;
00325   std::string valueText;
00326 
00327 
00328   ChartSerie* bigOne=getBiggestSerie();
00329   for (int i=0; i<bigOne->size(); i++){
00330     valueText=bigOne->getXCaption(i);
00331     valueTextWidth=getTextWidth(valueText, captionFontSize);
00332 
00333     if (valueTextWidth>ret){
00334       ret=valueTextWidth;
00335     }
00336   }
00337 
00338   return ret;
00339 }
00347 void RainbruRPG::Core::ChartLine::drawLegend(gdImagePtr im){
00348   int squareWidth=15;
00349   int legendInteriorMargin=10;
00350 
00351   int top=exteriorMargin+legendExteriorMargin+legendTitleFontSize+20;
00352   int bottom=imageHeight-exteriorMargin-titleMargin-legendExteriorMargin;
00353   int right= imageWidth-(exteriorMargin/2)-legendExteriorMargin;
00354   int left= imageWidth-(exteriorMargin/2)-legendWidth+legendExteriorMargin;
00355 
00356   int black=gdTrueColor(0, 0, 0);
00357 
00358   int color=0;
00359 
00360   tChartSerieList::const_iterator iter;
00361   for (iter=chartSerieList->begin(); iter != chartSerieList->end(); iter++){
00362 
00363 
00364     gdImageFilledRectangle(im, left+legendInteriorMargin, top, 
00365                            left+legendInteriorMargin+squareWidth, 
00366                            top+squareWidth, seriesColor[color]);
00367 
00368     gdImageRectangle(im, left+legendInteriorMargin, top, 
00369                      left+legendInteriorMargin+squareWidth, 
00370                      top+squareWidth, black);
00371     
00372     
00373     
00374     drawTrueType((*iter)->getLegendCaption(), 
00375                  left+legendInteriorMargin+squareWidth+10,
00376                  top+squareWidth-2 , im, black, 10);
00377 
00378     color++;
00379     top+=20;
00380   }    
00381 }
